channel.title: Why isn't catalyst working with my Laptop?
channel.description:
I tried downloading catalyst mobility (Or something like that) for my laptop which has an ATI MobilityRadeon X300, and the website clearly states that catalyst IS compatible with that card. First, let me explain something. When you go to download it, instead of just downloading the driver, you download a program that makes sure you computer and graphics card are compatible. Well, when I go to install it, the verification program shows this:
[img]http://img206.imageshack.us/img206/3253/catalyst1ud.png[/img]
I do not want to get them from Dell, because their drivers are out of date.
